name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: ha.failover-controller.graceful-fence.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the FC waits for the old active to go to standby

name: dfs.namenode.reconstruction.pending.timeout-sec
description:
Timeout in seconds for block reconstruction.  If this value is 0 or less,
    then it will default to 5 minutes.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.minimum-allowed-tasks
description:
The minimum allowed tasks that
  can be speculatively re-executed at any time.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.max.concurrent.tracked.nodes
description:
The maximum number of decommission-in-progress or
    entering-maintenance datanodes nodes that will be tracked at one time by
    the namenode. Tracking these datanode consumes additional NN memory
    proportional to the number of blocks on the datnode. Having a conservative
    limit reduces the potential impact of decommissioning or maintenance of
    a large number of nodes at once.
      
    A value of 0 means no limit will be enforced.

name: ipc.[port_number].weighted-cost.lockexclusive
description:
The weight multiplier to apply to the time spent in the
    processing phase which holds an exclusive (write) lock.
    This property applies to WeightedTimeCostProvider.

name: ipc.client.connection.maxidletime
description:
The maximum time in msec after which a client will bring down the
               connection to the server.
